newsitem.title: USA: Summit Medical names Willemin interim CEO.
newsitem.headline: Summit Medical names Willemin interim CEO.

text.p: Summit Medical Systems Inc said Monday Richard Willemin has been appointed interim chief executive officer, replacing John Nehra who will remain as chairman of the board.
In July, Nehra became acting chief executive officer when then-president and chief executive Kevin Green resigned.
Willemin will also continue to hold his position as chief financial officer, the company said.

The company will continue its search for a permanent chief executive and has engaged Larry Ross of Ross and Co Inc, a leading healthcare information search firm, to conduct a chief executive officer search on behalf of the company.
A committee of two outside directors, Nehra and W. Hudson Connery Jr, is leading the search, the company said.
Summit Medical provides systems and information services for the healthcare industry.
Summit shares closed at 2-8/16 on Friday.
